elements: Twelve pence, or one-twentieth of a pound, will support me for a day in adequate comfort.
A package of peculiar papers arrived today from my predecessor's executor. I should study them.
My intellect should be put to better use! But the pay is better than labourer's work.
I earn a little more; I stay a little later. Envy glints in the eye of the junior clerk who occupies my old desk.
Cryptic directions to the obscure address of a certain Morland, a dealer in the rarer sort of book.
The dim premises of Miss Morland, who deals in rare and sometimes dangerous books.
